data.name: AboutPage_AboutDescription
data.value: Набор служб Windows и оптимизированного под сенсорный дисплей интерфейса для расширения возможностей вашего портативного игрового устройства. Включает в себя следующие фукнции: управление движением(гироском), эмуляцию виртуального контроллера, оверлей быстрого доступа, виртуальные сенсорные панели, визуализация контрллера, систему настроек профиля для каждого приложения. Handheld Companion использует драйвер ViGEmBus и библиотеки ViGEmClient, а также драйвер фильтра режима ядра HidHide. Алгоритмы управления движением основаны на работе Jibbsmart и доступной информации на GyroWiki.

data.name: ControllerPage_UncloakOnCloseDesc

data.name: ProfilesPage_TriggerDeadZoneLeftDesc

data.name: ProfilesPage_UMCMotionOnOffDesc
data.value: При отключенном управлении движением используйте выбранные кнопки для включения, при включенном используйте выбранные кнопки для отключения.

data.value: Преобразовывать движения устройтва в ввод с контроллера

data.name: ProfilesPage_Whitelist
data.value: Разрешить приложению доступ к физическому контроллеру устройства

data.name: QuickPerformancePage_PowerModeDesc
data.value: Оптимизизация на основе энергопотребления и производительности

data.name: QuickPerformancePage_TDPLimitDesc
data.value: Ограничивает мощность процессора для уменьшения общего энергомотребления

data.name: ServiceDescription
data.value: Обеспечивает поддержку гироскопа и акселерометра для Windows через эмуляцию контроллера. Если служба включена, встроенный контроллер будет скрыт от приложений, не входящих в белый список. Если служба отключена, встроенный контроллер будет включен, а виртуальный контроллер отключен.

data.name: SettingsMode0_AimingDownSightsDesc
data.value: An additional motion sensitivity multiplier when aiming down sights or scope through the use of the configured activation button

data.name: SettingsMode0_FlickDurationDesc
data.value: Change the flick duration, calibrate to 180 degree turn, in milliseconds

data.name: SettingsMode0_FlickStickDesc
data.value: Point camera in direction of (right) joystick flick, rotate camera purely in horizontal plane by rotating

data.name: SettingsMode0_SensitivityDesc
data.value: Change the motion sensitivity of the horizontal and vertical axis

data.name: SettingsMode0_SensitivityXDesc
data.value: Change the motion sensitivity of the horizontal axis

data.name: SettingsMode0_SensitivityYDesc
data.value: Change the motion sensitivity of the vertical axis

data.name: SettingsMode1_DeadzoneDesc
data.value: Change the steering deadzone, in degree. Improves steering straight

data.name: SettingsMode1_MaxSteeringAngleDesc
data.value: Change the maximum steering angle value, in degree

data.name: SettingsMode1_SteeringLinearityDesc
data.value: Mapping between input and steering. Lower values provide more accuracy near full lock but less accuracy near the center. Higher values provide more accuracy near the center but less accuracy near full lock. 1.0 is a linear mapping

data.name: SettingsPage_AppLanguageWarningDesc
data.value: Чтобы изменения вступили в силу, перезапустите приложение

data.value: Приложение будет запускаться автоматически при входе в Windows.

data.value: Запустите от имени администратора чтобы разблокировать эти настройки

data.name: Enum.MotionInput.AutoRollYawSwap.Desc
data.value: This input will operate as a simple joystick. Ideal for laptop and clamshell type handhelds, automatic yaw roll swap based on how device is being held (90 or 180 degree open).

data.value: Define controller layout when in desktop mode

data.value: You might want to click on Connect next to your plugged controller.

data.value: You have no physical controller connected. No inputs will be sent to HC or its service.

data.name: ControllerPage_NoVirtualControllerAction
data.value: You might want to start companion service or make sure your virtual controller status is set to: Connected

data.name: ControllerPage_NoVirtualControllerDesc
data.value: Your physical controller is hidden, yet you have no virtual controller available. No inputs will be sent to games.

data.name: ControllerPage_PhysicalControllerHiddenAction
data.value: You might want to unmute your virtual controller or unhide your physical controller.

data.name: ControllerPage_PhysicalControllerHiddenDesc
data.value: Your physical controller is hidden, yet you have muted your virtual controller.

data.name: ControllerPage_PhysicalControllerNotHiddenAction
data.value: You might want to hide your physical controller or mute your virtual controller.

data.name: ControllerPage_PhysicalControllerNotHiddenDesc
data.value: Your physical controller is not hidden, yet you have an unmuted virtual controller. You might encounter double inputs in games.

data.name: ControllerPage_SteamControllerHDRumbleDesc
data.value: Use high-definition rumble engine, at the cost of higher CPU usage

data.name: ControllerPage_SteamControllerMuteDesc
data.value: Временно отключает виртуальный контрллер в Steam приложених

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.Default
data.value: This is your default controller profile. This profile will be applied for all your applications that do not have a specific profile. Some options requiring an executable might be disabled.

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.IsRunning
data.value: Oops. This profile seems to be running. Some options requiring an executable may be disabled.

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.MissingExecutable
data.value: Oops. It seems this profile does not have an executable. How is this even possible?

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.MissingPath
data.value: Oops. It seems this profile does not have a path to the application. Some options requiring an executable might be disabled.

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.MissingPermission
data.value: Oops. It seems you do not have the necessary permission level to modify the content of this application. Make sure you have started this program in administrator mode.

data.name: Enum.ProfileErrorCode.Running
data.value: Oops. It seems this profile excutable is running. Some options requiring an executable might be disabled.

data.name: Enum.MotionInput.JoystickSteering.Desc
data.value: This input will operate as a joystick optimized for controlling a steering wheel or a racing game

data.name: LayoutPage_SaveGameInfoLayout

data.name: Enum.MotionInput.PlayerSpace.Desc
data.value: This input will operate as a joystick optimized for controlling a first or third person camera

data.name: ProfilesPage_AreYouSureApplyTemplate1
data.value: Are you sure you want to apply this template? All layout settings will be overridden.

data.name: ProfilesPage_AreYouSureApplyTemplate2
data.value: You can't undo this action. Previously applied template: {0}

data.name: ProfilesPage_EPPDesc
data.value: Specifies power distribution policy between CPU and GPU

data.value: Adjust main display resolution and refresh rate

data.name: QuickPerformancePage_FanOverrideDesc
data.value: Set the fan duty cycle to user-defined value

data.name: SettingsPage_ForceVirtualControllerOrderDesc
data.value: Forces the virtual controller to be detected as first controller during Windows start. Enable this if your app/game doesn't detect your inputs (requires device reboot).

data.name: SettingsPage_ForceVirtualControllerOrderText
data.value: Your device must be restarted in order for the changes to take effect. Would you like to restart now?

data.name: SettingsPage_HideWhenLoseFocusDesc
data.value: Automatically hide quick tools when the user clicks outside of window

data.name: SettingsPage_HwInfoDesc
data.value: Automatically turn HWiNFO off when companion is closed

data.name: SettingsPage_NativeDisplayOrientationDesc
data.value: Some features depend on knowing the native display orientation to work properly. If this was not detected properly, set your display's orientation to the orientation that matches your controller, then click Detect

data.name: SettingsPage_QuickToolsBackdrop
data.value: Quicktools backdrop, none, mica, tabbed, acrylic

data.name: SettingsPage_RivaTunerStatisticsServerDesc
data.value: Automatically turn RTSS off when companion is closed

data.name: SettingsPage_VirtualControllerForceOrderDependencyText
data.value: Disabling this setting will also disable "Improve virtual controller detection". Do you want to continue?
